title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the enumerated power in Article I of the Constitution that gives Congress the authority to regulate a business like the one in the scenario. The response must include a reference to the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the two-chamber structure of the legislature affects the ability of Congress to exercise the power described in part A.

For Task C, the response must explain how these companies could use the political process to ensure that the new regulation does not negatively affect them, if Congress decides to regulate how social media companies gather and use the data of their users.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.

The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
